title: IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Research Associate Post
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Kharagpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
